description: This file defines a set of API endpoints related to recommendations within a FastAPI application. It sets up a router with a specific path prefix and tags, and includes a single endpoint /recommendations/for-ca that returns role recommendations for a Chief Architect based on adjacency overlap.

methods.name: for_ca(min_overlap: float = Query(55.0, ge=0, le=100, description="Minimum overlap % to include"), limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="Maximum number of results"))
methods.description: API endpoint for retrieving role recommendations for a Chief Architect based on specified overlap and limit parameters.

ctags.name: for_ca
ctags.pattern: /^def for_ca(min_overlap: float = Query(55.0, ge=0, le=100, description="Minimum overlap % to incl/
ctags.signature: (min_overlap: float = Query(55.0, ge=0, le=100, description="Minimum overlap % to include"), limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="Maximum number of results"))
